information.bccRewardsDescription: Learn about the four-phase BCC release system based on member activation milestones. Rewards decrease progressively to ensure long-term sustainability.

information.layerRewardsSystemDesc: Layer rewards are triggered by member upgrades in your downline. Layer 1 rewards are based on direct referrals but display through matrix hierarchy. Layers 2-19 follow standard matrix placement with recursive tree view up to 19 levels.
information.matrixDescription: This visualization shows how the matrix structure works. When members upgrade levels in your layers, it triggers corresponding layer rewards.
information.matrixPrincipleDesc: BEEHIVE uses a 19-layer 3×3 matrix system, with each level representing one layer in the matrix.
information.matrixStructureDesc: Each level represents a layer in the matrix. When members in your layer upgrade their membership level, it triggers layer rewards based on the upgraded level.

bccReleaseSystem.title: BCC Release Rewards

bccReleaseSystem.description: BCC tokens are released through a four-stage system based on total activated members

stage1.title: Stage 1: Members 1-9,999
stage1.description: Full release amounts for early adopters

stage2.title: Stage 2: Members 10,000-29,999
stage2.totalLocked: Total Locked Rewards: 5,225 BCC (50% of Stage 1)
stage2.levelPattern: All release amounts are 50% of Stage 1

stage3.title: Stage 3: Members 30,000-99,999
stage3.totalLocked: Total Locked Rewards: 2,612.5 BCC (50% of Stage 2)
stage3.levelPattern: All release amounts are 50% of Stage 2
stage3.description: Release amounts reduced by another half

stage4.title: Stage 4: Members 100,000-186,000
stage4.totalLocked: Total Locked Rewards: 1,306.25 BCC (50% of Stage 3)
stage4.levelPattern: All release amounts are 50% of Stage 3
stage4.description: Final stage with minimum release amounts

bccReleaseSystem.mechanismDescription: BCC tokens are automatically released to your balance when you activate each membership level
bccReleaseSystem.stageReduction: Each stage reduces release amounts by 50% as community grows
